name: Nighty Knights
description:
Nighty Knights is a 3rd person 3D dungeon crawler where the player fights manifestations of their own fear in their own dungeon-like dream world. The player's goal is to reach the end of the dungeon and awake from sleep.

In Nighty Knights you get to:

  • Explore a dungeon blending medieval and dream-like aesthetics.
  • Never explore the same dungeon twice with procedurally generated layouts making for great amounts of replayability. 
  • Master the well crafted ranged and melee weapons
  • Fight dream-like enemies each with strengths and weaknesses.
  • View the world from a 3rd person perspective.
  • Fight the nightmarish Nighty Knights to escape from the dungeon.

The Controls are :
Camera - Mouse Movement

Foward - W

Left - Back - S

Right - D

Melee Attack - Mouse 1

Ranged Aim - Mouse 2

Ranged Attack - Mouse 1 + hold Mouse 2

Dodge - Spacebar + direction you want to dodge (with WASD)
